column1: Table Title: Tourism Receipts By Major Components (Year-To-Date), Quarterly

Data are year-to-date figures, i.e., refer to the period from the first day of the calendar year up to the current date.  The lower tourism receipts in year 2020 was due to the impact of COVID-19.  STB has reviewed the methodology for data collection and computation of tourism receipts so as to better capture tourism performance.  Tourism Receipts from 2016  have been updated based on the revised methodology.  Comparison of data before and after 2016 is not recommended.
Tourism Receipts -> Sightseeing, Entertainment & Gaming (Million Dollars):
Includes entrance fees to attractions and nightspots, expenditure on day-tours, leisure events.  From 2010, data includes gaming expenditure as well as entertainment at the integrated resorts.

Includes expenditure on airfares on singapore-based carriers, port taxes, local transportation, business, medical, education-related items and by transit/transfer visitors.  From 2020, data also include COVID-19 related costs.
na   not available or not applicable
-     nil or negligible or not significant
Numbers may not add up to the totals due to rounding.
Data are the latest available at the time of access or download. Some statistics, particularly those for the most recent time periods, are provisional and may be subject to revision at a later date.
Values are shown in Singapore dollars (unless otherwise specified).
